triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Core subject of the review - comprehensive study of UAVs as aircraft without human pilots for diverse applications.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: Paper discusses UAV swarms as a key concept for coordinated multi-agent systems in aerial operations.

triples.name: Wireless network
triples.relevance: Wireless communication is identified as a key application domain and enabling technology for UAV operations.

triples.name: Search and rescue
triples.relevance: Search and rescue is identified as a primary application area where UAVs provide significant operational advantages.

triples.name: Precision agriculture
triples.relevance: Precision farming is highlighted as an important agricultural application domain that benefits from UAV deployment.

triples.name: Battery energy storage system
triples.relevance: Battery endurance and energy storage are identified as critical technical challenges limiting UAV flight time and persistence.

triples.name: Autonomous robot
triples.relevance: Flight autonomy is identified as a key technical capability and research direction for unmanned aerial systems.
